alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Central Greenville; Greater Pickens; Southern Greenville (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 3:20PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Greenville, north central Anderson and northeastern Pickens Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 320 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Greenville Downtown, or 4 miles west of Travelers Rest, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenville Downtown, Easley, Greenville Eastside, West Greenville, Berea, Welcome, Powdersville, Travelers Rest, Paris Mountain State Park and Cherrydale Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Anderson; Central Greenville; Greater Pickens; Southern Greenville
